description: Unique code identifying the part class/category; often structured to support hierarchies for grouping parts and applying pricing or reporting rules.
Human-readable name or description of the part class.
Free-text notes or comments about the part class; optional.
Pricing rule type for this class (e.g., percent vs. fixed); values and behavior likely system-defined; confirm with SME.
Percentage used to mark up or discount items in this class, according to the markup term; confirm sign and rounding rules with SME.
Fixed charge or price applied to items in this class when the markup term dictates a fixed amount; confirm currency and application logic with SME.
Rate associated with a pricing or maintenance plan for this part class; likely used when calculating planned costs; confirm units and usage with SME.
Default unit of measure for items in this part class (e.g., each, kit); used for pricing or reporting; confirm whether it overrides item-level UOM with SME.
User or process that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created, in system time.
User or process that last modified the record; null if never updated.
Timestamp of the most recent update; null if never updated.
